heading: C.1 Brief Fatigue Inventory
text: Brief Fatigue Inventory (BFI) 9 item survey designed assess fatigue severity cancer patients (Mendoza et al. 1999). item measured 0-10 numeric scale. final score mean 9 measure items can range 0-10. score can calculated least 5 items 9 answered taking mean completed items.

heading: C.2 Godin Leisure-Time Exercise Questionnaire
text: Godin Leisure-Time Exercise Questionnaire (GLTEQ) two item instrument developed asses leisure-time activity levels order classify people ‘active’ ‘sedentary’ categories aim using instrument measure activity levels implementation community health /fitness programs relation psychosocial variables [@].
